    • com.blade中Environment的使用

      返回Environment的com.blade中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Environment Environment.add(String key, Object value)
      And Set the same
      Environment Environment.addAll(Map<String,String> map)
      Add a map to props
      Environment Environment.addAll(Properties props) 
      static Environment Environment.empty()
      Create an empty environment
      Environment Blade.environment()
      Return the application's environment configuration information.
      Environment Environment.load(Environment environment)
      Properties to Environment
      static Environment Environment.of(File file)
      Load environment by file
      static Environment Environment.of(Map<String,String> map)
      Map to Environment
      static Environment Environment.of(Properties props)
      Properties to Environment
      static Environment Environment.of(String location)
      Load environment by location
      static Environment Environment.of(URL url)
      Load environment by URL
      Environment Environment.set(String key, Object value)
      Set a value to props
      参数类型为Environment的com.blade中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Blade Blade.environment(Environment environment)
      已过时。
